Title: Cento modi per uccidere
Writer: Leonardo Fasoli (creator), Leonardo Fasoli (screenplay), Leonardo Fasoli (story), Maddalena Ravagli (screenplay), Roberto Saviano (creator)
Actors: Salvatore Esposito, Walter Lippa, Giovanni Allocca, Carmine Battaglia
Plot: Genny is cornered when the Savastanos' rivals rally around Conte and he also faces trouble internally as his supporters and old lieutenants battle. Imma intervenes and establishes order and realizes that Ciro is behind this war.
